name: Rekor Systems, Inc.
description: Rekor Systems, Inc. is an innovative technology company specializing in intelligent transportation systems and automated license plate recognition (ALPR) solutions. Founded in 2017 and headquartered in Columbia, Maryland, Rekor aims to revolutionize the way organizations and municipalities manage traffic and security using advanced AI and machine learning technologies. The company's primary offerings include ALPR solutions that provide real-time vehicle identification and analytics, enabling law enforcement agencies, tolling authorities, and parking operators to enhance their operational efficiency and public safety. Rekor also offers a cloud-based platform that integrates data from various sources to help clients make informed decisions based on actionable insights. With a commitment to improving transportation infrastructure and public safety, Rekor is positioned to play a significant role in the smart city movement. The company's mission focuses on leveraging technology to create safer communities and more efficient transportation systems, reducing congestion and enhancing the overall quality of urban life.
